mapper.select: select krom.roomnum,fname,roomname from keeproom krom join roomfile romf on romf.roomnum=krom.roomnum join room rom on rom.roomnum=krom.roomnum where id=#{id} and filenum=1
select count(*) from keeproom where id=#{id} and roomnum=#{roomnum}
mapper.delete: delete keeproom where id=#{id} and roomnum=#{roomnum}
